titles.title: A bill to authorize 2 additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado.
A bill to authorize 2 additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill amends the federal judicial code to increase from seven to nine the total number of U.S. district court judgeships for the District of Colorado. The President must appoint, with the advice and consent of the Senate, two additional judges for that judicial district.
